Product name: Moroccan Handmade Cactus Pillowcase Home Accessory Couch Accents Bedroom Pillow Kilim Sabra Silk, White color
Description:
Fabulous Moroccan pillowcases, made of fibers obtained from cactus plant in Morocco.  The long, pointed leaves of the cactus are crushed, the fibers washed and hammered, then the leaves soaked in water to separate the fibers and filaments. These are then spun to make thread and dyed using all-natural dyes such as indigo, henna and saffron. Design appears on one side and back side is plain with same color and material. 
♦ double sided (design only on one side) 
♦ materials used: Cactus fibers
♦ pillowcase only, ships without insert
♦ zip closure 
Condition: Excellent!
Approx. measurements: sizes vary from 18" x 20" (46cm x 51cm) to slightly larger 20” x 19” (51cm x 48cm)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DOMESTIC SHIPPING (USA)
Shipped within 1-2 business days to the address provided from your PayPal account. All west coast domestic orders are shipped via "Priority Mail" with tracking. East coast domestic packages are shipped "Parcel Post" to save on shipping. Insurance is included on all purchases over 50.00 in value. Please notify us if you would like to add insurance to orders under 50.00 or if you would like to upgrade to "Priority Mail" or "Express Mail" shipping methods at an additional cost.
INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING
All international orders are mailed via USPS First Class Mail International. Any order weighing over 4 lbs will be shipped via Priority Mail. Shipping upgrades and insurance may be purchased for an additional fee. Please note that any customs fees, taxes and/or duties incurred at the time of delivery are not included and are the sole responsibility of the buyer. Please understand that I am unable to accommodate requests to mark shipments as “gifts” to avoid any of the fees mentioned above. Delays in delivery do occur from time to time due to international customs.
RETURNS
The objects I sell are vintage and are at least 20 years old, which is why I strive to describe items accurately as they may have manufacturer's flaws or the wear and tear of time. Please consider reading the description carefully and contact me with questions before making a purchase. 
California residents: sales tax will be added upon PayPal checkout.
For international shipping, please email your location for a shipping quote.

Product name: MADE TO ORDER Raw Diamond Earrings Rough Diamond Earring Natural Diamond Earring Wedding Earrings Bridal Studs Mothers Day Earrings
Description:
This is for a MADE TO ORDER pair of earrings similar in style and size to the pictures above.
If you have a specific request on the size, shape or color of stone please let me know otherwise these earrings will be similar to the above photo's.
These earrings are small.
Gemstones are raw California Diamonds, both are clear/translucent in color.
Earrings and posts made of solid sterling silver.
California - Lake County Diamonds are quartz.
Science has its own explanation for these wonders of nature. Lake County has been the scene of incredible volcanic activity throughout its ancient past. Mount Konocti, the area's defining landmark, is a dormant volcano where past lava flows of magma and basalt were contained under enormous pressure with temperatures of not less than 1,112 Fahrenheit. Heat and pressure resulted in the formation of beta silicon dioxide crystals - Lake County Diamonds - of unsurpassed clarity and the finest optical quality. 
Lake County Diamonds are mostly clear and very hard, ranking from 7.5 to 8 (and possibly as high as 9) on the Mohs Scale, and like all diamonds, they can cut glass. They have been used commercially and industrially, but are in greatest demand as semi-precious gems. Lake County Diamonds may be set uncut for a rough natural look, or faced to set off their inner fire which compares in brilliance to African carbon diamonds.

Product name: Amethyst Necklace Purple Crystal Necklace Crystal Pendant Copper Electroformed Natural Stone Necklace  Boho Jewelry Gypsy Necklace Gothic
Description:
Amethyst Necklace / Crystal Jewelry / Amethyst Pendant / Handmade Crystal Jewelry
A beautiful amethyst wand electroformed in copper and given a vintage patina.
~Each piece becomes a natural work of art as the copper forms itself around the crystal and takes on its own unique shape and form. 
~The electroforming process takes 24-48 hours to create each piece. It is then sanded, polished and finally given a blackened patina.
Listing is for 1 necklace from the ones shown in the picture or similar ones that may not be shown. 
Each piece and crystal is unique and beautiful. Please allow for differences.
*Want to choose your own piece? Just send me a message and I'll send you picture of what I currently have to choose from. You can then pick out whichever one you like. If not no worries I will pick out a lovely piece just for you.
 These crystal pendants measure approximately 1-3/4" to 2" long & hang on a solid copper chain in your choice of length.
~Each piece is handmade in my home studio. 
All items come ready for gift giving in a recycled kraft paper box. 
~Visit my shop for more raw crystal jewelry.. 
http://www.etsy.com/shop/FoxLark

Amethyst is a natural tranquiliser, it relieves stress and strain, soothes irritability, balances mood swings, dispels anger, rage, fear and anxiety.  Alleviates sadness and grief, and dissolves negativity.  Amethyst activates spiritual awareness, opens intuition and enhances psychic abilities.  It has strong healing and cleansing powers.  Amethyst encourages sobriety, having a sobering effect on overindulgence of alcohol, drugs or other addictions.  It calms and stimulates the mind, helping you become more focused, enhancing memory and improving motivation.  Amethyst assists in remembering and understanding dreams.  It relieves insomnia.  Encourages selflessness and spiritual wisdom.

Product name: Peacock - cotton linen maxi skirt / green maxi skirt / peacock feather necklace skirt (Q1028)
Description:
Sitting here watching reviving of the sun
By a lake full of peacock colored ripples
Hiding here listening to “ Pavane pour une infante defunte”
By a window full of rain dancing outside
*****************************
A skirt for peacock princess or queen, inspired from Ravel’s debut piano work. Asymmetrical, romantic, a little sorrow and a little crazy all at once. 
* With fashion jewelry inspired over long waist strings decorated with wooden beads, silver bells and peacock feathers. You may wear it as necklace as well since it is detachable. It is detachable so that you can machine wash the skirt.
* Asymmetrical cutting, shape and length of the skirt adjustable with four drawing strings by sides. We make the slits for strings in slightly different length to get a unique touch; please do take a moment to understand this detail. The drawing strings can be knotted to be earthy and simple bowknots. 
* The shape and length of the skirt is adjustable with two out-seam drawing strings, there will be beautiful ripple like pleats all around you.
* Quality linen fabric, perfectly constructed textile and touch. It is difficult to justify the quality by pictures, it is the most tricky part of online shopping. It is our goal from this year, we only use the best fabrics we can find, online shopping is not just impulse purchase by pretty pictures, unique designs deserve quality fabrics even they are humbly priced. 
* Peacock feather is the only feather we will use for designs, it is stunningly beautiful, and doesn’t need to kill the bird to get, so it goes with our animal friendly policy. It is too beautiful to be true, the first question most people see it in real life will ask “ is it really real?” The illustration was finished early this year, we begin making it until now we find reliable supply for top quality big eye peacock feathers from Thailand (love to work with Thai people!). 
* The skirt is easy to wear and versatile, can be dressed down or dress up, goes with Less is More off the shoulder top or a simple shirt you already have. It can be a strapless dress as well. It can be worn with jacket for a unique fall and winter look as well.
* Support 7 days return to get full refund on item without any reason. 
* Designed and handmade by honest family company, ship worldwide, we will use express shipping by default, buy more, only charge one item's shipping.
* Details: 
1. Elastic waist
2. ankle length (accommodable to mid-calf length)
3. sitting on low waist by default(accommodable to natural waist or around belly button)
Color option: 
1. green,
2. black
3. indigo blue, 
6. tiling gray and pleated beige, kindly refer to this：
7. pleated beige. 
For more pictures on above colors, please check:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/idea2lifestyle/search?search_query=Q1028&order=date_desc&view_type=list&ref=shop_search
* The top to match with the skirt is Long long sleeves:
http://www.etsy.com/listing/80449668/long-long-sleeves-y1116
*****************************
Piece info:
* Material: 100% high quality silky linen (medium to heavy weight, not sheer, soft and breathing, good for all year around), peacock feather, wooden beads，stainless bells
* Care: gentle and cold machine wash, tumble low and line to dry
 
* Measurements:
All sizes are available, hand made by us, lead time is 4-6 days; may have a few in stock to ship the day you pay, kindly contact us for storage status).
you may pick up a size from sizing chart and let me know your HEIGHT to calculate length. Or give me your measurements on your natural waist(will calculate your low waist/highhip for you), hips and height before or after payment (I will send you measurement guide if you need).  If you have some specific request or special character you think we need pay attention to when making, do let me know.

Description:
Here it is... a shorter version of the beloved Day Tripper Hoodie Dress. I totally love this!
Made with vibrant colors set against an earthy brown back ground. This dress is ALIVE and will make you feel like dancing :)

This is a LIGHTWEIGHT cotton fabric, so it is best as a summertime dress!  The fabric is light but also stretchy.  Some women have worn this during the winter, with leggings and even with sleeves or gloves.
